name: Vegenions
description:
Vegenions

Vegenions is a simple 2D platformer, whose graphics are kept in pixels.

The main character is an apple tree, who moves into the big wide world to make friends.

He has to overcome many obstacles and avoid traps on his way. He also has to defeat monsters, who want to harm him.

Controls

Move: W,A,D;

Shoot: Q,E;
